wikipedia_page.main: Paul William Compitus (born 9 April 1966 in Surrey, England) is a fashion designer and educator noted for his sexy, avant-garde, surreal and often futuristic style.

response: He regularly collaborates with visual artists, including Robert Longo (American Landscapes, 2019)Cindy Sherman (The Island of Misfit Toys and The King is Dead, 1994 and I Drink The Air Before Me , 2009), Anish Kapoor (Strange Attractors II), Donald Baechler (Extravenous and A Mid-Summer Night’s Dream, 1997), Stephen Hannock (Not Garden, 1999), and Charles Atlas (Wrong Wrong, 1990), as well as fashion designers Benjamin Cho, Rachel Roy, Tara Subkoff/Imitation of Christ, Leigh Bowery, Tanya Sarne/Ghost, Paul Compitus, Michael Angel, Tony Cohen, Adam Kimmel, Jillian Lewis, and Manolo.
